s: ^I've been okay, but tired. You know how it is. I'm just trying to get this block party started.
^I'm doing really great! I'm really looking forward to this Block Party I've been planning.

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "I do know. I've been here trying to get more programs started, and doing admin work."
^Rashad?Smiling "Plus, the library has basically become a hub for social services. It's not just books these days."

s: ^Really? That sounds like a lot of work to do.
^I feel you there. Is there anything I can help with?

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "It really is a lot of work, honestly. Between us, the board isn't always understanding when it comes to what the community actually needs."
^Rashad?Smiling "Someone has to watch out for us, you know? Anyway adventurer, is there anything I can help you with?"

s: ^I do need something from you if it's not too much?
^I do have something, but you're dealing with a lot. You know if you ever need an extra hand or support...

Chat3: ^. It really is a lot of work, honestly. Between us, the board isn't always understanding when it comes to what the community actually needs."
^Rashad?Neutral "Someone has to watch out for us, you know? Anyway, is there anything I can help you with?"

s: ^Yeah, there's something you can help me with, if you have the time?
^I was wondering if I could convince you to have a library tent at the block party where people could sign up for a library card, or hear about library services?
^I could really use a library tent for the Block Party.

QuestDetails1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Hmm, that's not too hard, but the library is swamped. It would help me a lot if I could find someone for this open position in the YA section."
^Rashad?Smiling "It's perfect for a student, who knows YA Lit. Do you think you may know anyone?"

s: ^I may know someone. Can you tell me some more information?
^Hmm. I'm not sure if I know anyone. Can you tell me some information?
^Sure! If I can find someone for the job, can we get the library on board?

QuestDetails2: ^Rashad?Neutral "Sure! We're looking for a part time worker in the YA section to reshelve books, run a help desk, and run a storytime on Saturdays."
^Rashad?Neutral "If you find someone, just have them send to the posting on the library website."

s: ^I think I can find someone, do you think you could do the Block Party if I do?
^Excellent. Is there anything else I should know?

OptionalQuestDetails1: ^Rashad?Smiling "I mean, it'd be perfect for a student. You can study when you staff the help desk. Oh, they'll need at least 1 reference, too."
QuestAcceptance: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yes! I'll be able to move some things around. If you can find someone to apply for the YA position, we could even have the bookmobile there!"

s: ^Yes! I love the bookmobile, thanks Rashad!
^Thanks, man. i appreciate this. I can find someone!

Goodbye: ^Rashad?Smiling "Solid. If we can get even a single application it would help a lot. Octavia and Charles are going to be super excited about the weekend. I'm going to head into a meeting, see you soon!"

s: ^I hope you're ready to drive the bookmobile! See you soon!
